description: This file defines a React component 'IssueTypeModal' that displays a modal dialog for viewing Jira issues of a specific type within a project. It includes fetching issues via an API, rendering issue details, handling loading and error states, and visual styling.

methods.name: IssueTypeModal
methods.description: React functional component that renders a modal for Jira issues of a specific type, manages state for issues, loading, and errors, and fetches data on mount or when dependencies change.
